text: Janeane Garofalo (born September 28, 1964) is an American political activist, stand up comedian and actress. She was co-host on the radio show The Majority Report. Garofalo is of Italian and Irish descent. Her father is a former executive at Exxon. Garofalo was raised as a conservative Catholic. Garofalo now describes herself as an atheist. She had two Emmy AwardJaneane Garofalo Emmy Nominated nominations for her role on The Larry Sanders Show. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American atheists Category:American progressives Category:Comedians from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American political activists Category:American radio personalities Category:American television actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: Janeane Garofalo
